DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective is to test the impact of short message service (SMS) reminders, with or without unconditionally provided mobile-money incentives, can improve measles vaccination coverage in rural western Kenyan infants.
DOC.brief_title: Mobile and Scalable Innovations for Measles Immunization: a Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Caregiver of infant aged 68 months at time of enrollment Selfreported resident of one of the study villages; where the definition of a resident is defined by caregiver Willing to sign informed consent for the study Child of enrolled caregiver has already received one dose of measles vaccine, not including any supplemental measles vaccines Caregiver plans to move away in the next 6 months
